95  struct IndexData
96  {
97  CommonTime tt; // time of epoch
98  int pG1, pG2; // number of points in pass
99  double fG1, fG2; // float index solutions
100  double dG1, dG2; // uncertainty on the float solutions
101  int nG1, nG2; // integer index solutions
102  };
103
